parts.text: {"word":"ample","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"十分な、豊富な、有り余るほどの","english_definition":"more than enough; plentiful; abundant.","examples":[{"sentence":"There was ample evidence to convict him.","translation":"彼を有罪にするには十分な証拠があった。"},{"sentence":"The hotel room was ample and comfortable.","translation":"ホテルの部屋は広くて快適だった。"},{"sentence":"We have ample time to finish the project.","translation":"プロジェクトを終えるには十分な時間がある。"}],"collocations":["ample opportunity (十分な機会)","ample space (十分なスペース)","ample evidence (十分な証拠)","ample supply (十分な供給)","ample resources (十分な資源)","ample time (十分な時間)"],"synonyms":["sufficient","plentiful","abundant","copious","generous","lavish","bountiful"],"antonyms":["insufficient","scarce","meager","limited","deficient"]},{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"(体型が)ふくよかな、ゆったりした","english_definition":"(of clothing or a person's figure) of generous or more than adequate size.","examples":[{"sentence":"She wore an ample skirt.","translation":"彼女はゆったりとしたスカートをはいていた。"},{"sentence":"He had an ample figure.","translation":"彼はふくよかな体型をしていた。"}],"collocations":["ample bosom (豊かな胸)","ample hips (ゆったりとした腰)"],"synonyms":["full","plump","rounded","voluptuous","curvy"],"antonyms":["slim","slender","thin","scanty"]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の「amplus」（大きい、広い、豊富な）に由来する。","priority":"★★★"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˈæmpl/","syllables":"am-ple","audio_url":"https://example.com/ample_audio.mp3"},"inflection":{"adjective_forms":{"comparative":"ampler","superlative":"amplest"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**ample**」は主に「十分な、豊富な」という意味で使われ、必要量を満たし、余りあるほどの量や大きさがあることを表します。物理的な空間や量だけでなく、時間、証拠、機会など、抽象的なものにも使われます。体型を表す場合は「ふくよかな、ゆったりとした」という意味になります。フォーマルな語彙で、日常会話よりも書き言葉でよく使われます。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ The ample of food was delicious.","correct":"✓ The ample amount of food was delicious. / ✓ There was ample food and it was delicious.","note":"「ample」は形容詞なので、名詞の前に置きます。「ample of」という形は使いません。"},{"incorrect":"✗ He has an ample of experience.","correct":"✓ He has ample experience.","note":"「ample」は形容詞なので、名詞の前に置きます。「ample of」という形は使いません。"},{"incorrect":"✗ The ample was enough.","correct":"✓ The amount was ample. / ✓ There was ample.","note":"「ample」は形容詞なので、単独で主語にはなれません。名詞を修飾するか、be動詞の補語として使います。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["amplify (動詞: 増幅する、拡大する)","amplitude (名詞: 広さ、大きさ、振幅)"],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"C1","frequency_google_ngram":"中頻度 (Moderate frequency) - フォーマルな文脈でよく使われる。","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"C1","text":"「**ample**」は、何かが必要以上に十分にあることを表す単語です。例えば、「ample time（十分な時間）」や「ample space（十分なスペース）」のように使います。また、人の体型について言うときには、「ふくよかな」という意味で使われることもあります。フォーマルな単語なので、日常会話よりも、文章の中でよく見かけます。"},{"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The garden provided an **ample** supply of vegetables.","translation":"庭では野菜が十分に供給された。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"十分な・豊富な"},{"sentence":"She had **ample** opportunities to succeed.","translation":"彼女には成功するための十分な機会があった。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"十分な・豊富な"},{"sentence":"The new house has **ample** room for the whole family.","translation":"新しい家には家族全員が住むのに十分な広さがある。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"十分な・豊富な"},{"sentence":"The dress was designed to flatter her **ample** figure.","translation":"そのドレスは彼女のふくよかな体型を美しく見せるようにデザインされていた。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"ふくよかな"}]}
